title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 36 - Discharge And Conditional Release Of Patients
content:

State Regulations
§ 36.1 - Statement of philosophy
§ 36.2 - Definitions
§ 36.3 - Use of conditional release
§ 36.4 - Community placement of patients discharged or conditionally released
§ 36.5 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 36

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§9.01, 29.01, 29.11, 29.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
